meanings.definition: relating to the study of flags
meanings.sent1: The vexillological book provided detailed information about different flags.
meanings.sent2: She had a vexillological interest in understanding the meanings behind various flags.
meanings.sent3: The vexillological quiz was challenging but fun to solve.
meanings.sent4: His vexillological knowledge soared higher than any flagpole.
meanings.sent5: The vexillological presentation was so engaging that even those uninterested in flags were captivated.

meanings.definition: the study of flags and their symbolism
meanings.sent1: Learning about vexillological history helped him appreciate the significance of flags.
meanings.sent2: The vexillological course covered a wide range of flag designs and meanings.
meanings.sent3: The vexillological club organized a flag-themed party to celebrate their love for flags.
meanings.sent4: In the world of vexillological exploration, every flag tells a unique story.
meanings.sent5: The museum exhibit on vexillological studies showcased flags from different eras and cultures.
